Interface Environment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MavenEnvironment

    public interface Environment
    Testing environment.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File basedir()
      Get basedir of the project.
      Set<File> classpath(boolean tonly)
      Return a set of artifacts (JARs and dirs) that should be available for all "running-as-remote" Groovy scripts.
      int port()
      Get port number, that can be used for a web container in runtime.
      boolean useRuntimeFiltering()
      Shall we use runtime filtering of web resources?
      File webdir()
      Get web root, normally a directory in "target/" folder.

      • classpath

        Set<File> classpath(boolean tonly)
        Return a set of artifacts (JARs and dirs) that should be available for all "running-as-remote" Groovy scripts.
        Parameters:
        tonly - The list should include ONLY test-related artifacts?
        Returns:
        The list of JARs and directories

      • useRuntimeFiltering

        boolean useRuntimeFiltering()
        Shall we use runtime filtering of web resources?
        Returns:
        Shall we?

      • port

        Get port number, that can be used for a web container in runtime.
        Returns:
        The port number, just allocated/reserved
